name: Inventory Manager
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: The Inventory Manager can communicate with the player's inventory. You need to right click a Memory Card and put the card into the manager to use it.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/inventory_manager/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your Inventory Manager to a computer to make use of it!
